p: Principal component analysis (PCA) and hierarchical cluster analysis (HCA) using Statistica ® v.8.0 ( www.statsoft.com, accessed on 1 April 2021) and StatistiXL ® Version 2.0 add-in for MS Excel ® ( www.statistixl.com, accessed on 1 April 2021) were applied to examine the interrelationships between the chemical compositions of the essential oils.
